title: Prithviraj Sukumaran pens sweet birthday wish for wife Supriya Menon
body: Recently, Prithviraj Sukumaran and his wife Supriya had invested in Kochi Pipers FC, a team in the Super League Kerala (SLK).Kochi Pipers FC is among the six teams in the inaugural season of SLK, scheduled to begin in late August this year.

title: Malappuram sign Brazilian Barboza
body: Malappuram FC added Brazilian striker Sergio Barboza to their squad for the inaugural Super League Kerala. Barboza demonstrated his skill with 13 goals in 21 games last year for Delhi FC in the I-League. Known for his leadership and precise crosses, Barboza brings crucial experience and talent to the team.

title: ISL-winning coach to train Malappuram FC
body: Indian Super League winning coach John Gregory will coach Malappuram FC in the inaugural edition of the Super League Kerala. Get all the updates on this exciting collaboration!

title: Aussie Gillan to coach Calicut FC
body: Kochi: Ian Andrew Gillan, the 58-year-old Scottish-born Australian, has been named the head coach of Calicut FC, the Kozhikode-based franchise in the newly established Super League Kerala.

title: Gillan to coach Calicut FC in Super League Kerala
body: Ian Andrew Gillan, the 58-year-old Scottish-born Australian, has been named the head coach of Calicut FC, the Kozhikode-based franchise in the newly established Super League Kerala. Gillan has more than 25 years of experience with various clubs and holds an AFC A license.
